item.title: Emmy Anomalies: Their Shows Were Snubbed, But They Weren’t
item.description: Nearly a dozen of this year’s acting nominees were from series that were otherwise completely shut out.

item.title: Watson Moves onto CBS’ Fall Lineup, ‘FBI’ Spinoff ‘CIA’ Pushed to Midseason
item.description: The network has also set its fall premiere dates, with the bulk of the schedule rolling out in October.
